home.title: Home
home.description: Welcome to the summer internship project created by Aziz Baoueb. This website was built to explore frontend development with React and test interactive features.

about.title: About
about.description: This project was developed during the summer of 2025 as part of an internship. The goal is to get familiar with React, component structure, custom CSS, and dynamic navigation.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: The main project is to create a simple architecture with a sidebar, a visual navigation bar, and well-defined sections. Itâ€™s a practical exercise to understand how a React app works.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This project was created by Aziz Baoueb. For any questions or feedback, feel free to reach out. The site is constantly evolving and may integrate more features in the future.
